text: Manje uMvelinqangi usenenzele kwabalula kunina futhi wazi ukuthi kunobuthakathaka kunina ngakho-ke uma kukhona abayikhulu kunina ababekezelayo bayonqoba abangamakhulu amabili futhi uma kukhona abayinkulungwane kunina bayonqoba abayizinkulungwane ezimbili ngentando kaMvelinqangi futhi uMvelinqangi ukanye nababekezelayo
